summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of 33rd Ave. S. from S. Alaska St. to S. Oregon St.; by constructing concrete sidewalks together with curbs and gutters; by such grading or regrading as may be necessary providing for the necessary surface drainage; all in accordance with Resolution No. 25450 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement District therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
